long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
User-friendly software platform for Room Booking, Desk Booking, Visitor Registration, and Digital Signage Solutions.

GoBright Chrome Extension is part of the cloud based GoBright Platform. In the Flexible Workplace, the office is no longer the only place people work at. With the GoBright App, staying in touch and booking the space you need at the office is effortless. Stimulate communication and collaboration between your colleagues by using Smart Workplace Solutions and contribute to an effective Flexible Work environment. Check the video to see how the GoBright Portal works!

The office is a place for collaboration. Meeting partners, customers, and colleagues to be inspired is what employees are looking for in an office building.

By using the GoBright App, you bring the GoBright Online Portal to your trusted Microsoft Teams environment. Book your meeting room and desk in the same space as you arrange your videocalls, chats, and calendar by using your laptop or mobile phone. Arrange Catering and Services, invite and, pre-register your visitors, or book your parking space, or locker at the same time. No more switching. Easy as ever. Especially when you are already in a videocall with a customer, and you want to arrange a meeting at the office the next week. Simply stay within Teams, open the GoBright App, book a meeting room and invite your customer.

Applying Smart Office technology to the workplace helps employees work better and faster. With GoBright you create your own Way of Working which increases productivity and morale. Work better, smarter, and faster with the GoBright App and stay flexible!
